Sentencas: The coupling between biomass gasification and Solid Oxide Fuel Cells can represent a sustainable and efficient system for electricity production.
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass

Sentencas: This work aims to develop a preliminary model for the operation of a tubular, electrolyte-supported fuel cell (SOFC) fed by a syngas mixture.
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass

Sentencas: The fuel required by the SOFC system is produced inside the energy generator box from an integrated biomass gasification system.
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass

Sentencas: This study stems from the European DB-SOFC project, that proposed the exploitation of the abundant biomasses deriving from agricultural residues for energetic purposes (as from olive oil and wine production).
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass

Sentencas: In this study, the main processes have been simulated to find a possible configuration to obtain a power value of 200 W. 25 cells were used in the model to produce the required power.
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass

Sentencas: The results showed that at 0.7 Vit is possible to achieve 12.3 W, when the biomass gasification was integrated into the SOFC box, while it was possible to achieve 9.6 W when the system was fed by externally produced syngas.
Titulo: CFD model for tubular SOFC directly fed by biomass
